title: UI Training Materials
thumbnail_alt: Fuel gauge with red, orange, yellow, and green sections.

media.caption: Find out if your website is broken
media.alt: Screenshot of the Is This Website Broken website

media.caption: Get squishy on the Respond site
media.alt: Screenshot of the Respond training website

media.caption: Get your learn on with the RWD School of Rock!

overview:
Sometimes I build things, and other times I build things to teach others about best practices for building things.

  • "Is This Website Broken" was built to promote the importance of content accessibility.
  • "Respond" was used as part of a series of presentations on the benefits and challenges of responsive design.
  • "RWD School of Rock!" was a training program aimed at helping designers and quality assurance engineers get on the same page about responsive design as more clients began requesting responsive sites.
stack: Good ol' HTML, CSS, and Javascript
